title: Fred Anderson Endowed History Scholarship Fund
description: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for students studying history.  Recipients will be selected in accordance with procedures for awarding need and merit-based scholarships.  Scholarships will be awarded for one year and are renewable.
marketingContent: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for students studying history. Recipients will be selected in accordance with procedures for awarding need and merit-based scholarships. Scholarships will be awarded for one year and are renewable.
